strings:
<voice_0x01000DDC><se_low>King Trode: Ah, you've found something!
Let's read it and see if it can be of any help.

The party members pore over the book they
have just found.
<voice_0x01000DDD><se_low>King Trode: So what we've discovered is that long, long ago the area where we found the ship was at the bottom of an ocean.

<voice_0x01000DDE><se_low>King Trode: Hm. It doesn't really help us now though.
If only the ocean still existed,
it would be plain sailing...haha...ah...
